grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-16" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffe6cc;strokeColor=#d79b00;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="419" width="728" height="391" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-15" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" parent="1" vertex="1"> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-3" value="MauiProgram CreateMauiApp()" style="rounded=1;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="111" y="639" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-5" target="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-2" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=1;exitY=0.5;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;dashed=1;" edge="1" parent="1" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-5" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-6" target="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-5"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-6" value="App<div>(Constructor)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="394" y="729" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-11" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.75;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;dashed=1;" parent="1" source="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-8" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-10" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-8" value="AppShell<div>(Constructor)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;dashed=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="514" y="435" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-14" value="" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;" parent="1" source="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-10" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-13" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-10" value="MainActivity<div>(Constructor)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="450" y="260" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-22" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="1" source="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-13" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-21" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="736" y="590" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-13" value="MainPage<div>(Constructor)</div>" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="676" y="435" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-17" value="Platform Specific Code" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="290" y="220" width="150" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-18" value="Shared Code" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="231" y="413" width="94" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-19" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;" parent="1" source="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-20" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="171" y="150" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="480" y="380" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-20" value="Start" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffcd28;strokeColor=#d79b00;gradientColor=#ffa500;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="146" y="120" width="50" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-21" value="Event Loop" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#ffcd28;strokeColor=#d79b00;gradientColor=#ffa500;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="880" y="435" width="79" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-23" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.095;exitY=1.052;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=1;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;" parent="1" source="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-24" edge="1" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-10"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="600" y="190" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="570" y="250" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-24" value="Android-Specific, use for <b><i>setting splash screen, application icons</i></b>, and bootstrapping native / JNI interoperability" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="660" y="130" width="240" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-1" value="MAUI-core implements a customised <i><b>Android.App.Application</b></i> class for Android, and MainApplication is derived from that class so that we can add our own customisations. It contains the global app context and states. <b><i>It is normally not required to modify this class</i></b>, and instead have a singleton class that, if needed (for registering broadcast receivers, etc.) can get context passed to it via an argument." style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="220" y="80" width="390" height="100" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-3" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.209;entryY=0.214;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;" parent="1" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-15" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="270" y="180" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="220" y="190" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-4" value="Builds the MAUI application Host, configuring required services (eg: logging, etc.)," style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="84" y="837" width="160" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-6" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.5;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;" parent="1" edge="1" source="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-4"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="150" y="590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="164" y="720" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-7" value="Entry point for our application - where resources used across all application is declared, and the <b>application is bootstrapped</b> to showing its first screen. It basically contributes to the Maui.Controls.Application class. Unlike the platform-specific application class (which MainApplication derives from), this can be used for cross-platform initialisations.It also is a place to handle all the application life-cycle events." style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="273" y="830" width="420" height="103" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-8" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;exitX=0.432;exitY=-0.012;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;exitPerimeter=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;" parent="1" edge="1" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-6" source="gTM1q3ibaHPlL2RjoFX6-7"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="350" y="590" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="350" y="530" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.5;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-1" target="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-7"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <Array as="points" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-1" value="Cross-Application initialisation / bootstraping" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;rounded=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="394" y="525" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-5" value="OR" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="429" y="624" width="50" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-10" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0;entryY=0.5;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-7" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-8"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-7" value="OR" style="ellipse;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fontStyle=1" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="429" y="440" width="50" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-9" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;entryX=0.353;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-7" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-10"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-11" value="This is <b><i>an optional method</i></b> in the same class or another class that can be used for any cross-application bootstrapping. This is completely optional, and is a standard method, but we could also have all this within the App class itself. In the MauiAppSample, we put this in the <b><i>AppBootstrapper class</i></b>, and the function Bootstrap() in that class starts the visual hierarchy." style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="530" y="700" width="416" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-13" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=1;entryY=1;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;exitX=0.25;exitY=0;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;" edge="1" parent="1" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-11" target="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="580" y="610" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="630" y="560" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-14" value="AppShell is an interesting addition to MAUI that simplifies the Visual Hierarchy of the application, and <b><i>eases the navigation between pages, jumping to out-of-hierachy pages, etc</i></b>. It also gives an <b style="font-style: italic;">integrates search experience. </b>One very important feature of an AppShell is that the <b><i>pages are loaded lazily</i></b> - i.e., data is loaded only when asked for.<div><br><div>&nbsp;AppShell is an <b><i>optional feature</i></b> provided - and if you have other means to handle navigation (eg: using the ), then you can completely avoid AppShell.</div></div>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;whiteSpace=wrap;rounded=0;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="590" y="525" width="500" height="110" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-16" value="" style="endArrow=classic;html=1;rounded=0;entryX=0.927;entryY=1.03;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;entryPerimeter=0;exitX=0.11;exitY=0.023;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;strokeColor=#CC0000;exitPerimeter=0;" edge="1" parent="1" source="vRoYWt7nCFk0nEcomBqk-14" target="mhOwj7Ck6F5uom22lQsf-8"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="620" y="560" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="670" y="510" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

div.div: Android-Specific, use for setting splash screen, application icons, and bootstrapping native / JNI interoperability

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 388px; height: 1px; padding-top: 50px; margin-left: 137px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: MAUI-core implements a customised Android.App.Application class for Android, and MainApplication is derived from that class so that we can add our own customisations. It contains the global app context and states. It is normally not required to modify this class, and instead have a singleton class that, if needed (for registering broadcast receivers, etc.) can get context passed to it via an argument.

switch.text: MAUI-core implements a customised Android.App.Application class f...

div.div: Builds the MAUI application Host, configuring required services (eg: logging, etc.),

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 418px; height: 1px; padding-top: 802px; margin-left: 190px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: Entry point for our application - where resources used across all application is declared, and the application is bootstrapped to showing its first screen. It basically contributes to the Maui.Controls.Application class. Unlike the platform-specific application class (which MainApplication derives from), this can be used for cross-platform initialisations.It also is a place to handle all the application life-cycle events.

switch.text: Entry point for our application - where resources used across all appl...

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div: This is an optional method in the same class or another class that can be used for any cross-application bootstrapping. This is completely optional, and is a standard method, but we could also have all this within the App class itself. In the MauiAppSample, we put this in the AppBootstrapper class, and the function Bootstrap() in that class starts the visual hierarchy.

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 498px; height: 1px; padding-top: 500px; margin-left: 507px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
AppShell is an interesting addition to MAUI that simplifies the Visual Hierarchy of the application, and eases the navigation between pages, jumping to out-of-hierachy pages, etc. It also gives an integrates search experience. One very important feature of an AppShell is that the pages are loaded lazily - i.e., data is loaded only when asked for.
AppShell is an optional feature provided - and if you have other means to handle navigation (eg: using the ), then you can completely avoid AppShell.
